headline: McDONALD'S ANNOUNCES QUARTERLY CASH DIVIDEND
summary: Today, McDonald's Board of Directors declared a quarterly cash dividend of $1.77 per share of common stock payable on June 16, 2025 to shareholders of record at the close of business on June 2, 2025.

raw.headline: McDONALD'S ANNOUNCES QUARTERLY CASH DIVIDEND
raw.summary: Today, McDonald's Board of Directors declared a quarterly cash dividend of $1.77 per share of common stock payable on June 16, 2025 to shareholders of record at the close of business on June 2, 2025.

headline: Investors sue Krispie Kreme after McDonald’s donut deal falls to the McWaySide
summary: The suit alleges that the donut maker made ‘materially false’ and misleading statements about the partnership, and failed to notify investors that the venture was not profitable

raw.headline: Investors sue Krispie Kreme after McDonald’s donut deal falls to the McWaySide

headline: Tariff-Driven Dollar Woes Help Brighten First-Quarter Earnings
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Tariffs unexpectedly devaluing the US dollar — and in turn boosting corporate earnings — was one of the few bright spots of the first-quarter earnings season in North America. headline: Krispy Kreme sued by investors over McDonald’s rollout pause
summary: The lawsuit claims the chain failed to disclose profitability issues it was having with the QSR partnership, which subsequently led to a steep decline in stock prices after Q1 2025 earnings.

raw.headline: Krispy Kreme sued by investors over McDonald’s rollout pause
raw.summary: The lawsuit claims the chain failed to disclose profitability issues it was having with the QSR partnership, which subsequently led to a steep decline in stock prices after Q1 2025 earnings.

headline: Krispy Kreme faces investor lawsuit over halted McDonald’s expansion
summary: The doughnut giant had announced plans to supply fresh doughnuts to 12,000 McDonald's locations by the end of 2026.

raw.headline: Krispy Kreme faces investor lawsuit over halted McDonald’s expansion
